uk.co.crider.jablus.data

Interface Data2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LandOccupancy, MatrixData, RasterData

    public interface Data2D
extends Data
    Represents an object with raster data. Data is stored in a two-dimensional array, in a column major arrangement - which means that successive columns are stored contigously in memory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCols()
      Returns the number of columns in this raster
      float[][] getData()
      Returns the raster as an array
      float getData(int x, int y)
      Returns the data value at the given coordinates
      java.lang.String getFormat()
      Returns the format of the image file used to represent this data
      int getRows()
      Returns the number of rows in this raster
      void readRaster(java.lang.String file)
      Reads the image file and initialises the raster with the data
      void setData(float[][] data)
      Set the value of a cell
      void setData(int x, int y, float value)
      Set the value of a cell
      boolean toShow()
      Whether this dataset should be displayed when added
      void writeRaster(java.lang.String file)
      Writes the contents of this raster to disk, with the given name
